post.instructions: Here's a list of our labels. Please reply with the numbers of the labels you would like separated by commas. For example, if you want ({{labelExamples}}), reply with: {{numberList}}
post.verification: * Labels with asterisks will require manual verification
post.labelsAltText: Image with a title: {{labelerDisplayName}}. Beneath the title is a list of numbered options:
post.success: Okay, I put these labels on your account: {{appliedLabelNames}}
post.unlabelInstruction: If you ever want to remove a label, send me a post that says: {{unlabelCommand}}
post.verifiedLabelRequested: One or more of the labels you asked for needs manual verification ...
post.verificationInstruction:
To continue with verification, can you send an email to {{verificationEmail}} that includes:

1. Your Bluesky handle
2. The verified label you would like

It helps if the email comes from a domain that relates to the label, but if that isn't possible, we can still figure it out

error.maxLabels: Your account already has the maximum number of labels that we allow ({{maxLabels}}). If you want to switch to some new labels, you can remove labels from your account by sending me a post that says: {{unlabelCommand}}
error.commandNotAvailable: This command is not available at the moment. please try again later.
error.invalidNumber: Not all of these choices are valid numbers. Can you please try again?
error.invalidChoice: Not all of these choices are valid. Can you please try again?
error.duplicateLabel: You already have one of these labels ({{labelName}}). Can you please try again?
error.addingTooManyLabels: Adding this many labels would exceed the maximum that we allow on accounts ({{maxLabels}}). Can you please try again?
error.duplicateChoices: Not all of these choices are unique. Can you please try again?
